name: Granny
review: This sharpener does not clog ! It sharpens fast and does not waste the product being sharpened.

name: Judybgood
review: Pencil sharpener gives a smooth finish to my brow pencil.

name: Princess
review: It worked really well in my lip pencils, I'm very happy with it!

name: Erica
review: I was finally able to sharpen some of my eyeliners with this sharpener.  My old sharpener was not capable of sharpening all of my pencils.

name: Carly
review: Unable to use it - purchased it solely for use with the larger eyeshadow pencils.

name: Jiggabot
review: This sharpened my eye pencils really well!

name: Cathy
review: This sharpner is great!  Shavings are held snide until your ready to throw them out

name: Bernie
review: I wasn't pleased with the sharpener.  It didn't give a good point to my eyebrow pencil.

name: Amandabrilz
review: Works well but the bigger side wasn't the size I was looking for

name: Kayholla
review: I use it to sharpen my eye and lip liners.

name: Jane
review: This sharpener works great.  Doesn't shred my eyeliner pencil like my old one.

name: Baby B
review: This sharpener is a great tool. I love the little compartment that retains the shavers.  This can be used anywhere.

name: Littlered
review: Even works after I dropped it. I like the fact that I can use it with larger pencils when I need to do so.

name: Kelsey
review: I bought this sharpener for my Smashbox Eyeliner and my Two Faced lip liner. I figured the cheaper the better how bad could a sharpener be? It never has my pencils sharp and makes the wooden parts jagged and that tends to stab you in the eye or lip. Also when I'm sharpening something the top will pop off and the shavings will go everywhere. You get what you pay for, it technically works just not well. I would spend a few more dollars on a good sharpener.

name: FoxyG
review: It's my second time purchasing this sharpener. I bought my first one 10 years ago and it broke recently and I searched every where until I found it again. It's the best!

name: tatiananana
review: I used it for a plastic liner & a wooden liner.  It sharpened both very easily & the sharpener itself was easy to clean

name: Janay
review: I had lost my eye pencil sharpener that I had forever (so long that I couldn't even see the brand name on it). So I went to ULTA to find a replacement. I usually like Revlon products because they are a good quality and affordable. This product is no different.

name: artsy receptionist
review: The sharpen bits of any and all pencils fill the area where the shavings go fast. Empty instantly or sharpen with lid off to not clog the device.

name: Jay
review: Easy to use, gets the job done, and is afforable! A win in my book.

name: TLEM88
review: Nice compact size that will sharpener multiple sizes and keep the shavings until you can dispose. I have used others that "chew" into liner pencils. Ulta's house brand is good too, but this one is a little more compact. Great to keep in your travel bag for the gym or trips or freshening up when going out.

name: Dancer
review: Perfection!  Sharpens evenly

name: Middleagemom
review: I purchased this Revlon Universal Points Sharpener. I was looking for something to use to sharpen my Ulta eye crayons. The largest hole on the Revlon sharpener was too small. I took it back to the store; an employee was very helpful and I was able to exchange this product for an Ulta sharpener that works well.

name: Liz
review: Easy mess free

name: Damaris
review: This product is fantastic

name: StaceFace
review: I love that it has a cap on top to catch pencil shavings!

name: KRB31
review: Works really well, even on my plastic coated eyeliner.

name: AmandaArdmore
review: This sharpener is good in size and for the price compared to UD sharpener for 10$. I opted for this one and am glad I did!

name: Emma
review: The small sharpener is ideal for all lip liners & eye liners. Sharpens perfectly with cracking pencil tip.

name: Betty
review: Great for sharpening eyebrow and eyeliner pencils

name: 4J Mom
review: Not much to review about a sharpener, but here goes:  It's good and sharp, and does well with all sizes of makeup pencils, but the darned cover will not stay on and it makes a mess of the drawer unless you empty and clean it every time.

name: M
review: Like the multi pencil sizes sharpener and the shavings receptacle.

name: Jules
review: I liked that the larger opening has 2 sizes, which work with the NYX Jumbo Pencil I also got at the time of this purchase. Very helpful as not all jumbo eye pencils are the same width. This has two sizes for the jumbo type pencils. Works very well.

name: Judybgood
review: I use the pencil sharpener for my eyebrow pencil

name: Almi
review: Sharpens thick and thin pencils, lip and eye

name: Hesse
review: Works great on all my pencils. Plus it keeps shavings inside until you dispose of them. Plus inexpensive , win!

name: Belle
review: Works better than most sharpeners I've purchased before

name: lagrngrl
review: This is a great sharpener.  It works beautifully on my lip and eye pencils.  At this price it is a steal!  I highly recommend.

name: Judybgood
review: The pencil sharpener gives an even trim to my eyebrow pencil...works great and has a cover that can be emptied into the trash can for easy cleaning of the sharpener.

name: mhg
review: Works well for soft and hard eye pencils and shadows.

name: jutz
review: a sharpener that is wide enough for the larger lip/eye pencils is hard to find and this works perfect for all sizes

name: VEGAS GAL
review: slightest pressure breaks the lead all the way down

name: Mar
review:
This is an awesome sharpener; It truly works with my Benefit n Urban Decay pencils
I bought two just in case I can't find it later.

name: MK
review: This sharpener worked great on each of my pencils from an eclectic collection of brands.

name: HoneyJ
review: Bought this for my NYX Jumbo pencils and the few jumbo pencils I have that are Ulta brand. The bigger side has a detachable piece, so you can remove that for larger items. Definitely great for the price.

name: ellie
review: Provides a nice point on pencils.  Two sizes available.  Holds shavings.

name: garden girl
review: has a handy built in area to catch the shavings.  Function at a good price.

name: Sox RN
review:
This is the second time I bought this sharpener and I am very pleased with it
It even has a removable cuplet just in case you have larger pencils.

name: Gail
review: Better than others

name: Emily Teitelbaum
review: good product low price

name: alex
review: I fantastic economical pencil sharpener!

name: alison
review: blades are sharp and it contains the shavings well so it's great to throw into my make-up bag in my purse without worrying about a mess

name: Welch Girl
review: I thought it worked very well for an inexpensive sharpener.

name: Me in DC
review: My mom got this to sharpen a pencil from Ulta, and it's still too small... it was the biggest one they had in the store, but still not big enough to sharpen the pencils in the same store -__-

name: Ultaluv
review:
This sharpener really does accomodate many size pencils- wood or plastic.

It's worth the price.

name: Boo
review: I didn't pay too much attention to this sharpener when i first picked it up. I figured it was cheap and i needed a new sharpener anyway. Well this was a very good purchase and well worth it.

name: Misty
review: great overall product, can use on all sizes of make-up pencils.

name: Kat
review: Perfect size sharpner for the Ulta Eye Crayon and for my small eyebrow pencil. Extremely sharp blades that dont result in a "choppy" sharpening.

name: VZ
review: Accomadates different size pencils

name: Lilu
review: good sharpener

name: twa
review: i needed an eye pencil sharpener for a fat pencil. It was great and not expensive.
